hero.description: PVGround is a completely free design and analysis platform for your solar energy projects. We offer it for free to help the industry become better. We are grateful for feedback from those who want to support us.

features.title: PVGround
features.description: We're taking solar energy design to the next level with modern technology and advanced algorithms. Our advanced solutions and innovative approach will accelerate your projects.

advantages.description2: We take your solar energy projects to the next level with advanced optimization and user-focused design. We contribute to the industry's development by offering our platform completely free. We are grateful for feedback from those who want to support us.

bio.paragraph1: I have been actively working in the renewable energy sector for approximately 4 years. I began my career as a Site Supervisor for solar power plant installation projects, a role I held for 1.5 years. Subsequently, I served as a Project Engineer for one year, where I played an active role in project design and development using various software tools. Thanks to my quick learning ability and technical curiosity, I developed deep expertise in system simulations, added significant value to the team, and was promoted to the position of Project Team Lead as a result of this performance.
bio.paragraph2: During this time, my technical curiosity and passion for learning led me to develop personal projects and software tools. I designed AutoCAD plugins named PvROOF for rooftop solar projects and PvGround for ground-mounted power plants, aiming to optimize field design and site survey processes. Additionally, I worked on a prototype for an Energy Management System (EMS) for storage-integrated systems.
bio.paragraph3: Embracing the principle of continuous improvement, I aim to advance not only myself but also the teams and companies I work with. In this context, I produce and continue to publish educational content on my YouTube channel to share engineering knowledge. My ultimate goal is to provide meaningful added value to the industry and my country's energy future through the innovative software solutions I develop and my field-experienced engineering perspective.
bio.paragraph4: Additionally, the main reason I developed a tool like PVGround is my passion for seeing the challenges and shortcomings in the industry and creating solutions for them. During my field experiences, I saw how time-consuming manual calculations were and how prone to errors they were. This situation led me to develop a tool that would make engineers' work easier and contribute to the industry's development. I always love adding value to my country and the environment I'm in. PVGround being completely free is also a reflection of this passion - it's very important to me that the solar energy sector improves and everyone has access to professional tools.

1.content: PVGround has significantly shortened our project design times. Especially the shadowing analysis and capacity iteration features have made our work much easier. We get much faster and more accurate results compared to manual calculations.
1.name: Sibel Cansu Akdeniz

2.content: The DC-AC-HV cabling module works really great. It automatically finds the optimal cable routing even in complex projects. Thanks to PVGround, we both save time and make fewer mistakes.
2.name: Emre Dönmez

3.content: The 3D visualization feature is very useful when presenting projects to our clients. The terrain analysis is also very reliable as it works with real topography data. PVGround is truly a professional solution.
3.name: Talha Kırdemir

4.content: The reporting module is very detailed and professional. Technical drawings and analysis reports are generated automatically. With PVGround, we work much faster and more accurately compared to manual calculations. I definitely recommend it.
4.name: Sadık Toğrul

cta.title: Get Started
cta.description: PVGround is completely free. We offer it for free to help the industry become better. We are grateful for feedback from those who want to support us. Get started now and share your experiences with us.

footer.description: Next-generation platform for solar energy design. Completely free. We offer it for free to help the industry become better. We are grateful for feedback from those who want to support us.

section1.title: 1. Independent Development and Originality
section1.content: PV Ground is a free AutoCAD® plugin developed from scratch by an independent developer, based on general engineering principles, mathematical algorithms, and publicly available technical information in the solar energy sector. The source code and working logic of this software are completely original. No access has been made to any third-party commercial software source code, no copying has been done, no reverse engineering has been applied, or code has been decompiled.

section2.title: 2. No Commercial Connection
section2.content: PV Ground is in no way connected to PVcase UAB, Virto.CAD, Autodesk Inc., or any other commercial solar energy software provider. We have no partnership, data exchange, or commercial relationship with these companies. This software has not been authorized, supported, or approved by the aforementioned companies.

section3.title: 3. Trademarks
section3.content: All product and company names mentioned in this documentation, website, or software interface (such as PVcase™, Virto.CAD™, AutoCAD®, PVsyst™, etc.) are registered trademarks of their respective owners. The use of these names is solely for identification, comparison, and compatibility purposes (Nominative Fair Use) and does not imply any trademark infringement or sponsorship.

section4.title: 4. Warranty and Liability Disclaimer
section4.content: This software is provided to users "AS-IS". The developer makes no express or implied warranties regarding the software's perfection, merchantability, or fitness for a particular purpose. The developer cannot be held liable for data loss, calculation errors, or commercial damages that may arise from the use of the software. The user accepts to use the software at their own risk.

demo.title: Get your free PVGround demo today
demo.description: PVGround is moving solar forward with an alternative to the traditional labor-intensive, time-consuming, and error-prone solar project development process. Fill out the form to request a demo, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

releaseNotes.title: Release Notes
releaseNotes.description: Discover new features, improvements, and fixes in PVGround.

1.24.description: Version 1.24 with new icons, major changes in Ribbon Manager, and design optimized based on user feedback.

features.title: Multi PV Area Iteration
description: Iteration can now be created for multiple PV areas
Different spacing distances can be selected for each PV area

features.title: New Icons and Major Changes in Ribbon Manager
features.description: Ribbon Manager has been completely redesigned with new icons. The interface has been optimized based on user feedback and made much more user-friendly.

features.title: Frame Configuration Completely Renewed
description: Frame configuration has been completely renewed and images have been made dynamic
Converted to a low input, high output approach, significantly improving user experience
Design has been optimized based on end-user feedback

improvements: Iteration and placement have been significantly accelerated, 20 MWe projects can now be placed in around 4 seconds

improvements.title: Frames Dialog Update
improvements.description: Frames dialog has been updated, an image has been added and icons were added to the Save / Duplicate / Delete section to make the UI more visually appealing

improvements: Design has been made much more user-friendly and optimal based on end-user feedback
bugFixes: Fixed issue where PV modules appeared with dashed lines in PVC Export
Fixed issue where multiple paths on the alignment line prevented alignment
Fixed issue where some frames could not satisfy the tilt value at high north / south slopes

1.23.description: Version 1.23 with new features, improvements and bug fixes.

features.title: PVGROUND_RELOAD Command
description: When you close the plugin and want to reopen it, simply type PVGROUND_RELOAD in the command section
Quick and easy plugin reload
Restart the plugin with a single command from the command section

improvements: Shading Analysis dialog has been updated, made more compact and user-friendly
bugFixes: Fixed issue where DC cables moved meaninglessly during DC Cable 3D Convert
Turkish texts in info sections of some buttons have been corrected to English

1.22.description: Version 1.22 with new features and improvements.

features.title: Multiple PV Area Selection and Placement
description: You can now select multiple PV areas and perform placement simultaneously
More flexible project management with multi-area selection

features.title: Iteration Dialog Updates
description: Each iteration is now calculated in detail separately
Progress bars have been changed and made more informative
Iteration processes are more transparent and trackable
When performing iteration, you can now select multiple PV areas and choose iteration for 2 different PV areas
You can perform placement with separate spacing distances for each PV area

features.title: Automatic Terrain Adaptation
description: PV modules will now automatically adapt to the new terrain when you move them on the topographic map
Frames moved with both AutoCAD's move command and our Move Frames button will adapt
When moving with Move Frames, only frames are selected in bulk selections, while AutoCAD's move command allows you to select other elements
We recommend continuing with the button

features.title: Cable Cross-Section Calculation in Advanced Mode
description: Now provides cross-section mm² calculation and recommendations for AC Cables and DC cables in Advanced mode
Advanced calculation system for more accurate and optimized cable selection
Cable cross-section recommendations suitable for your project requirements

features.title: Corridor System Added
description: You can now automatically create corridors
Create safe access paths between your PV module placements with the corridor system
Eliminate the need for manual drawing with automatic corridor creation
Customize corridor widths and locations according to your project requirements
Corridors automatically adapt to the topographic map

improvements: Buttons for Battery Pack system to be added for storage systems have been created
Drainage Analysis section has been added, development work has begun
Layers section has been moved to the right of Project Setup section to avoid affecting the workflow and disrupting the PV module layout order, based on user feedback
bugFixes: Alignment issues with some frames have been fixed based on user feedback
Placement optimization has been increased
Minor level errors have been removed

1.21.description: Version 1.21 with new features and bug fixes.

features.title: Workspace' Read Contour Added
description: Now it's as easy as a click to convert your terrain's topographic map, whether extracted by survey engineers or from different import options, into a design that PVGround can understand
Import topographic data quickly and easily
Support for topographic map conversion from different formats

bugFixes: Licensing errors reported by some users have been fixed
Licensing system improved and stability increased

1.2.description: Version 1.2 with new features, performance improvements, and bug fixes.

features.title: Licensing System Added
description: User management improved with new licensing system
Secure and controlled access provided
User-based license management active

features.title: Export System Activated
description: Export system successfully activated
Comprehensive export support with Basic and Advanced modes

features.title: Basic Export System
description: Fully working, provides measurements for DC-AC cables
Optimized system for basic export operations
Fast export operations with user-friendly interface

features.title: Advanced Export System
description: Can export exact measurements for DC cables
Advanced analysis and detailed export features
AC cables development continues

features.title: AG Cable Export
description: AG cable export feature added
Export support for high voltage cable systems

improvements: Performance speedups implemented based on user feedback
Speed optimizations performed throughout the system
Export operations made faster and more efficient
bugFixes: Bugs identified through user feedback have been fixed
Errors in export operations fixed
General stability and performance improvements made

1.1.description: Version 1.1 with new features and improvements.

features.title: Iteration Added
description: Automatically calculate capacity for different pitch values
Compare multiple scenarios by setting pitch range and step values
View area, capacity, module count, and shading angle values for each iteration
View all results in table format and select the optimal pitch value

features.title: Pile Generator Added
description: Automatically calculate pile lengths based on terrain slope
Determine pile depths to create optimal pile placement for your project
Accurate length calculation for each pile based on topographic data

features.title: New feature added to Cross Selection - You can view placement before and after earthwork
description: Visualize terrain slope together with piles
Compare placement before and after earthwork operations
Create professional visualizations for presentations
Perform detailed analysis of your project with cross section view

improvements: Panel placement is now more precise and faster
bugFixes: UI errors fixed
Minor errors in panel placement calculations resolved
Cross Selection display issues resolved
General stability improvements

1.0.description: PVGround's first major release. A new era in solar energy design begins.
features: Electrical Dialog updated - Stringing design changed
bugFixes: Terrain loading issues fixed
Export function improved

0.9.description: Beta version - Important features and improvements.
bugFixes: Minor UI errors fixed
Preview display issues resolved

0.8.description: Early access release - Core features and testing phase.
bugFixes: Critical bugs fixed
Initial bug fixes

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: PVGround is completely free. We aim to contribute to the development of solar energy systems.
pricing.freeDescription: All features and tools are provided completely free of charge.
pricing.mission: We aim to contribute to the development of solar energy systems and support the growth of the industry. We offer our platform completely free to help the industry become better. We are grateful for feedback from those who want to support us.
pricing.missionText: As PVGround, we aim to contribute to the development of the solar energy industry and provide professional design tools accessible to everyone. With our completely free platform, we support the faster and more efficient implementation of solar energy projects. We offer it for free to help the industry become better and we are grateful for feedback from those who want to support us.
pricing.earlyAccessText: This program I have prepared for you is completely free as part of early access until 01.05.2026. If you would like to contribute to the development process or provide support, you can always reach me at info@pvground.com. Thank you for your support!
